div.p: The figure shows the GAM estimated relationships between average monthly dengue incidence and (A) Tmin 1∶2, (B) Tmax 1∶2, (C) Precipitation 1∶2, and (D) the proportion of the population with access to piped water. Solid lines indicate the average expected number of dengue cases (cases/100,000 people per month); dashed lines indicate the estimated 95% Bayesian estimation confidence intervals.
